MESSAGE.name: security.VLS_enabled
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Unable to disable VLS Error Handling, dialog boxes may appear.

MESSAGE.name: security.library_init
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Unable to initialize license server library.

MESSAGE.name: security.expired
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] The license for this machine has expired.

MESSAGE.name: security.hardware_tie
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Unable to tie license to hardware.

MESSAGE.name: security.locking_code
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Unable to generate a Locking Code for this machine.

MESSAGE.name: security.license_file
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Unable to create License file for write.

MESSAGE.name: security.ethernet
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Your ethernet card must be configured to eth0 for this code to work.

MESSAGE.name: security.no_license
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Unable to find a valid license for %1!s!.

MESSAGE.name: security.lock_code
MESSAGE.value:
[1-%0!05u!] Please go to http://www.lizardtech.com/licensing with the following Locking Code to unlock %1!s!.
Locking Code : %2!d!-%3!x!
Enter your License (control-c to terminate)

MESSAGE.name: security.entered
MESSAGE.value:
[1-%0!05u!] Your License number has been entered into the license file: %1!s! This file containing the License number from %2!s! is required every time you run this program.
Relaunch %3!s!.

MESSAGE.name: security.lock_code_usagemeter
MESSAGE.value:
[1-%0!05u!] Please go to http://www.lizardtech.com/licensing with the following Locking Code and Express Cartridge Manager ID to unlock %1!s!.
Locking Code : %2!d!-%3!x! Express Cartridge Manager ID : %4!s!
Enter your License (control-c to terminate)
